Definitions.Paraphrase:
a general direction or course of development
趋势
There emerges a trend towards the development of the information industry. 
呈现出了发展信息产业的趋势。

a specialist 
专家
She is an expert at figure skating. 
她是花样滑冰专家。
She is an expert in/at teaching children.  
她是儿童教育专家。

having much skill 
熟练的；有经验的
an expert painter 
熟练的画家
an expert chemist 
有经验的化学家

1. ask
问
He posed a difficult question to me. 
他问了我一个很难的问题。

2. stand or sit in a particular position to be drawn, photographed, etc. 
摆出姿势（供人画画、拍照等）
She was employed by the art school to pose for student artists. 
这所艺术学校雇她给学生作模特。

[pl.] facts; information 
资料；数据
Names, ages, and other data about the class are recorded in the teacher's notebook. 
这个班级的学生姓名、年龄和其他方面的资料都被写在老师的笔记本上。
Our task is to analyze the data that have been collected. 
我们的任务是分析收集到的资料。
The data we have collected are not convincing enough. 
我们收集的资料还不具备说服力。

the act of finding out information about something; study 
调查
A survey of public opinion is carried out by a group of experts in political science. 
一组政治学方面的专家对舆论进行了调查。
A survey shows that students today have more assignments to do. 
调查表明现在学生的作业量增加了。

look at or consider as a whole 
查看；鉴定
The young couple surveyed the new house they wanted to buy.  
这对年轻夫妇察看了他们想买的那幢新房。
The mayor surveyed the situation before taking action. 
市长在采取行动之前对情况作了调查。

1. development; increase 
发展；增长
China enjoys a fast economic growth.
中国经济快速增长。
2. growing of produce; the fact of being grown (as a crop) 
种植；长势
The nice growth of crops encourages the farmers to hope for a good harvest.
庄稼长势良好，使农民觉得丰收在望。
3. the act or rate of growing and developing 
成长
Trees take many years to reach their full growth. 
树木长成材需要许多年时间。

reducing; becoming less 
减少；下降
The survey shows that there is a decrease in the number of young people out of work. 
调查表明，年轻人的失业率下降了。

reduce, become less 
减少；下降
The population growth in that city is decreasing by 1.5% each year. 
那个城市的人口增长率每年下降1.5%。

be likely 
趋向于；可能
She tends to forget things. 
她常常忘事。

influence that helps to produce a result 
因素；要素
Money was the main factor in my decision not to buy a car. 
我决定不买车主要是因为钱。

too much; too great 
过分
Excessive smoking or drinking will cause damage to one's health. 
抽烟过多或饮酒过度有损健康。

very strong wine 
（烈性）酒
No alcohol is allowed on the university grounds. 
校园里是禁止喝酒的。

make (air, water, soil, etc.) dangerously impure or unfit for use 
污染
Emissions from automobiles and factories polluted the city. 
汽车和工厂的排放物污染了这座城市。

a large body in space that moves round a star, especially the sun 
行星
The picture shows six of the nine planets in the solar system. 
这张照片显示了太阳系9个行星中的6个。

1. become worse or less 
降低；变得不如以前
The number of students in the class declined from 25 to 20. 
班上学生的人数由25个减少到了20个。
Her health has been declining the past few months. 
这几个月来她的健康每况愈下。
2. refuse usually politely; being unwilling 
（婉言）拒绝
I invited him to a party but he declined.
我请他参加晚会，但他谢绝了。
I declined to go with them. 
我不愿和他们一道去。

process of becoming worse or less 
降低
If something is in decline, falling into decline, or on the decline, it is slowly growing smaller, weaker, or worse.
如果什么东西在缩减、衰弱或衰退，那它就是在渐渐变小、变弱或变差。
Our business has gone into a decline this year. 
今年我们的生意不景气。

1. a seed of rice, wheat, or other such food plants 
谷粒
Bring in every single grain. 
要做到颗粒归仓。
2. crops from food plants like rice or wheat
谷物；谷类
a grain-producing area 
产粮地区
China grows most grains the world knows. 
中国种植着世界上已知的大部分谷类植物。
3. a small hard piece
颗粒
grains of sand 
沙粒

1. the regular condition of the weather at a region over a period of years
气候
The climate of that area has been warming up. 
那个地区的气候在变暖。
2. condition of opinions 
（舆论）状况
The climate of public opinion before the 1990s was against income taxes. 
20世纪90年代前，公众舆论是反对征收所得税的。

disaster: sudden serious hard times 
灾害，灾难
Storm is a natural disaster. 
风暴是一种自然灾害。
Failing in the entrance examination is a disaster to him.
没有通过入学考试对他来说是场灾难。

1. a the meat of young sheep 
羊肉
2. a young sheep 
小羊；羔羊

1. the meat of furkey 
火鸡肉
2. a bird like, but larger than a chicken, used for food 
火鸡

quantity; total 
量
the amount of money
钱的数额
We spent large amounts of money on the bridge. 
我们建造这座桥花了许多钱。
the amount of money 
钱的数额

(to) equal to 
等于；达到
The words in the composition amount to 500. 
这篇作文的字数达到500个。

working well and without waste 
效率高的
A lawyer needs an efficient secretary. 
律师需要工作效率高的秘书。

use; make use of 
使用
Can you utilize a computer in your work? 
你工作中能用计算机吗？
Waterfalls can be utilized to produce electric power. 
瀑布可用来发电。

a part or print of a very old animal or plant, kept forever in rock, ice, etc. 
化石
They are looking for fossils in the valley. 
他们在峡谷中寻找化石。

of fossil
化石的
fossil fuels
矿物燃料
fossil oil 
石油

change; make or become different 
改变
If it rains we'll have to alter our plans for the holiday. 
如果下雨，我们就得改变我们的度假计划。

being, using, or producing the great power that is got by breaking up atoms 
原子核的；核动力的；应用核能的
nuclear energy 
核能
nuclear war 
核战争

1. firm; not shaking 
稳固的
I give you my steady support. 
我坚决支持你。
2. regular; not changing wildly 
平稳的
He drives the car at a steady speed. 
他以匀速开车。
3. not likely to change 
稳定的
I'd like to have a steady job.
我希望有个稳定的工作。

in a steady way 
稳定地
He moved back a little and stared steadily at her. 
他往后退了一点，然后死死地盯着她看。

quite a large area or part 
地区
Most countries and regions in the world welcome China's foreign policies. 
世界上大多数国家和地区欢迎中国的外交政策。

excellent; well-known; important 
优秀的
He is an outstanding student. 
他是个优秀的学生。

something made or produced 
产品
These products are China-made. 
这些产品是中国制造的。

able to be got, used, etc. 
能够得到的
Is there a doctor available? 
有医生看病吗？
The hotel has no available rooms. 
旅馆没有空房间了。

process something so that it can be used again 
（废物）再利用；废物回收
The goal is to recycle 98 percent of household waste. 
目标是使98%的家庭废物得到再利用。

chemical matter 
化学物质
Some chemicals are not allowed to be used on vegetables.
有些化学药品是不准用于蔬菜的。

of chemistry
化学的
chemical weapons 
化学武器
Chemical research has made possible many new products.
化学研究使得很多新产品成为可能。

(AmE) main road; highroad (BrE) 
公路
The highway was built last year. 
这条高速公路是去年修建的。
I saw quite a few car accidents on the highway. 
我在公路上见到了好几起车祸。

1. ability to do something easily 
轻易，不费力
As she is very clever and capable, she can pass the exam with ease. 
她很聪明，又有能力，能够轻而易举地通过这场考试。
2. state of being comfortable and without worry or anxiety 
安逸
Large amount of money provides her a life of ease. 
大量的金钱使她过上了安逸的生活。

advance or discovery 
突破
Scientists have made a breakthrough in computer science.
科学家们在计算机科学方面取得了突破。

a mass of quickly growing diseased cells in the body
肿瘤
With medical breakthroughs, tumors can be found easily.
医学上的突破使肿瘤很容易被发现。

1. medical operation
 手术
Many lives have been saved by surgery.
外科手术拯救了许多人的生命。
Thanks to the successful surgery, the patient recovers quickly.
由于手术成功，病人恢复得很快。
2. treatment of diseases or injuries by operation on the body
外科
oral surgery
口腔外科

diseased growth in the body 
癌症
His uncle died of lung cancer. 
他叔叔死于肺癌。

not interested 
不感兴趣；冷漠的
She is indifferent to her father's words. 
她对父亲的话无动于衷。

lack of interest; non-concern 
不关心；冷漠
Sandy's indifference to what her father had said annoyed her mother. 
桑迪对父亲的话毫不在意，这使她母亲生气了。

an example 
例子
for instance: for example 
例如
This is a typical instance of moral decline. 
这是个很典型的道德败坏的例子。
She mentioned an instance where their training had been a great help in dealing with problems. 
她举了个例子，从中可以看出他们所接受的培训对于解决问题很有帮助。

a serious spreading disease that attacks especially the lungs
肺结核
Tuberculosis, which had been wiped out, is coming back.
肺结核曾经被消灭，可现在又卷土重来了。

1. opinion resulted from reasoning; final decision 
结论
What conclusion did they arrive at? 
他们得出了什么结论？
He drew his conclusion with the support of the data. 
他根据这些数据得出了自己的结论。
2. end; established situation 
结束；结局
At the conclusion of the program, I asked the children if they had any questions they wanted to ask me. 
节目结束时，我问孩子们是否有什么问题要问。

many 
无数的
There are numerous books in his study. 
他的书房里有很多书。

a person or an animal that lives in a place 
栖居者
Our town has ten thousand inhabitants. 
我们镇上有一万居民。

cause (someone or something) to be part of, included in, mixed with, or deeply concerned in (something or doing something) 
卷入
How many people are involved in the accident? 
一共有多少人卷入了这场事故？
Have you ever been involved in any research project? 
你曾经参加过什么研究项目吗？

succeed in doing 
完成
United, we can do many things; divided, we accomplish nothing. 
团结，则事业成功；分裂，则一事无成。
We should do our best to accomplish the goal. 
我们应尽力实现这一目标。

Definitions.PartofSpeech:
at a shocking speed 
以惊人的速度
Population in that country grows at an alarming rate.
那个国家的人口在以惊人的速度增长。

destroy by flood, etc.
（被洪水）破坏
The river flooded its banks, washing away part of the main railway line. 
洪水淹没了河岸，冲坏了部分铁路干线。

I/We hope very much that ... 
愿......
May you succeed! 
愿你成功！
May all of you pass the exam! 
祝你们都通过考试！

get someone or something into a difficult situation or condition; cause to be mixed up in 
卷入
In some way he managed to involve several of his friends in the trouble. 
不知怎的，他使得他的几个朋友卷入了那场麻烦。
An accident in which five cars were involved caused the death of six people on the highway last night. 
昨天晚上，有五辆车卷入了一场事故，造成了六个人死在高速公路上。
His mistake involves all of us in a great deal of extra work. 
由于他的错误，我们大家都得多干许多活儿。

Definitions.Paraphrase: 丹麦（地名）
荷兰（地名）
不列颠（英格兰、威尔士和苏格兰的总称）（地名）
印度（地名）
墨西哥（地名）
新西兰（地名）
乌克兰（地名）

Definitions.PartofSpeech:
computerized axial topography scan 
计算机化X射线轴向分层造影扫描；CAT扫描
